ValidationRule.description: EWP registrations must enter at least 1 parent
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName='Entertainment_Work', OR( ISPICKVAL(Ready_to_Submit__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL( Ready_to_Resubmit__c , "Yes")), OR( Number_of_Parent_Guardian__c < 1) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Parents's information. Change the answer below to "No", return to the Parent's Tab, and complete all required information to continue.
